page.title: 10BRITISH TELECOM - RESEARCH.
page.content: SUBMARINE SYSTEMS. Special transistors and integrated circuits for submarine transmission have been developed. Telecom supply the ultra-high reliability transistors used by Standard Telephones and Cables for their systems. SATELITES. British Telecom is in the forefront of small earth station technology. A 3m dish aerial was used at Martlesham for early European video conference trials.In April 1984 digital models and video codes designed at Martlesham were used at a major international video conference held simultaneously in Tokyo, Sydney, Philadelphia, Toronto and London. INFORMATION NETWORK-There is a growing need for non-voice services. At Martlesham many new network capabilities and new forms of network have been produced.
